page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: BUS SERVICES Borstal village is served by several bus routes run by Maidstone and District Bus Company. These bus numbers pass down Borstal Street:155,156,127 and 126. The representative of the company revealed that the buses were mainly used by people too young to have a car,young people who cannot afford to run a car and also by elderly people who cannot afford or don't want to run a car. Most buses on this route run to a profit,but the Sunday services don't so the company receives subsidy from Kent County Council. Frequency of service:one of these buses arrives about every half hour,and the service operates until just after 10 p.m. The 152 service from Mereworth to Gillingham runs along the A228 Cuxton Road. It also is not profitable.
